messages.title: Personal message from HENRY BELLINGHAM
messages.content: It has been a huge honour to represent you over the past 30 years, and I am totally dedicated to serving you and to fighting day and night for our wonderful part of the country. ...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voted to secure new £30 million hospital for King's Lynn.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Backing local enterprise, tourism and the rural economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing projects that create valuable jobs and tourism opportunities.
Housing development must be sustainable and command public support.
Sourcing better infrastructure with widespread support.

issues.education: It is also incredibly important that we continue to raise standards across all school programmes, from nursery schools through to Universities.
issues.health: Visited the Health Secretary, lobbied the Prime Minister and Chancellor, secured a new £30 million hospital for King's Lynn.

housing.content: Housing development must be sustainable and command public support. We can give no quarter for urban sprawl.

leaflet.personalStatement: It has been a huge honour to represent you over the past 30 years...

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the campaign to stop the wretched incinerator; Maintaining current levels of Defence expenditure; Consistently campaigned for the increases in the Personal Tax Free Allowance...
